prompts: Create a powerful rock-type Pokemon that embodies strength with a sturdy physique and a fierce expression.
I want a legendary Pokemon with a majestic presence, combining earthy colors and a bold stance.
Generate a quadruped Pokemon with impressive horns and a muscular build, perfect for a battle-ready look.
Make a mythical creature that features a blend of gray and brown tones, standing tall in a mountainous environment.
Imagine a Pokemon with a unique armor-like appearance and a commanding aura, representing the spirit of the earth.
Design a Pokemon that has a stone-like texture with sharp features, evoking a sense of ancient power.
Show me a Pokemon that thrives in rocky terrains with a fierce gaze and a resilient posture.
